amendment.description: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase funding for the court-appointed special advocate and guardian ad litem program to $12,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. Porter.
